Package ohos.media.audio

Class AudioRendererInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.audio.AudioRendererInfo

  • public final class AudioRendererInfo
extends Object
    Provides the parameter structure required for audio playback, such as audio stream information, session ID, buffer size, offload mode flag, output flag, and distributed device ID.
    Since:
    2
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#AUDIO

    • Nested Class Summary
